full_summary:
# Solid State Drive (SSD) Disintegrator Tender

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 8 November 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 07 December 2022, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 09 December 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None (open-ended)

## Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND), as the end-user agency, seeks to acquire a Solid State Drive (SSD) Disintegrator to meet the standards for destruction of SSD and USB flash media as per the Information Technology (IT) Security Guidance for IT Media Sanitization.

## Mandatory Specifications

A comprehensive list of the mandatory specifications for the SSD Disintegrator can be found in the Annex of this tender document.

## Bid Submission Requirements

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 7 December 2022, at 14:00 EST.
* Any bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.
* All products and materials must be received by 4 Wing CIS FLT no later than 28 February 2023.

## Bidder Inquiries and Responses

Please direct all bidder inquiries and responses to:
Ruwani (Wall) - SPAC/PSPC
Contact Email: [ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

Please note that this tender is open to bidders from the following region:

* Alberta

The procuring department is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Contact Information

 For any inquiries or questions related to this tender opportunity, please contact Ruwani (Wall) at the provided email address.  #GGCronics123456[/markdown]  (Please remove that reference number.)
